Methods module
======================

This module is divided into two parts. The first contains the gapfilling methods, which are used to fill gaps in the metabolic network.
The second part contains the reconstruction methods, which are used to reconstruct the metabolic network from the omics data.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 3

   troppo.methods.gapfill
   troppo.methods.reconstruction

Base classes for Gapfilling and Reconstruction
--------------------------

.. automodule:: troppo.methods.base
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
